Cleveland.St. Martin de Porres High School (Clevel:
Saint Martin de Porres High School is a private high school in the St. Clair-Superior neighborhood on the East Side of Cleveland, Ohio.


== Background ==
Saint Martin de Porres High School was established in 2004 as a part of the Cristo Rey Network of work-study preparatory schools that allow promising students to rise above the deficiencies of the public school system in their area and to receive an education that maximizes their chances of finishing college.
